snippet.title: Castlevania Chronicles III - Dracula's Curse release trailer
snippet.description:
***game link below!!!!***
Experience Castlevania III like never before!  Enhanced visuals, mechanics and new abilities such as item crashes, updated spells and forms, fully remastered OST and much more!!!  
"Do you have what it takes to face me?!"
It's always better to play with friends, and this time you get to keep ALL your partners along the way!  

The hunt begins 3/31/24

Join our discord for Castlevania Chronicles 2 and Castlevania Chronicles 3.  Hang out, make new friends and have a GREAT time!  
https://discord.gg/jv9sprNasd

https://mega.nz/file/wn8BgKSS#CmXsWt6Enu65kMXhmIsPymbXMPsCBucnQTaE0SY_UT8

Special thanks to FatalVision for making this trailer, he did an amazing job!  Check and subscribe to his channel : https://youtube.com/@FatalVisionTV?si=h940mdFYxwEingYx

This is a fan-made remake of Castlevania 3 - Dracula's Curse.  No money was made and no distribution of any kind has been associated with its works.  WarMachine Studios is in no way affiliated with Konami Computer Entertainment.

All rights reserved by Konami
